analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Jāgaro cassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya sato sampajāno samāhito pamudito vippasanno ca tattha kālavipassī ca kusalesu dhammesu.
analyzed: jāgaraḥ cassa bhikkhave bhikkhu vihareyya sataḥ sampajānaḥ samāhitaḥ pamuditaḥ vippasannaḥ ca tattha kāla vipassī ca kusalesu dhammesu

original: Jāgarassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato satassa sampajānassa samāhitassa pamuditassa
analyzed: jāgarassa bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ viharataḥ satassa sampajānassa samāhitassa pamuditassa

original: vippasannassa tattha kālavipassino kusalesu dhammesu dvinnaṁ phalānaṁ aññataraṁ phalaṁ pāṭikaṅkhaṁ—
analyzed: vippasannassa tattha kāla vipassino kusalesu dhammesu dvinnam phalānam aññataram phalam pāṭikaṅkha

original: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā”ti.
analyzed: diṭṭhā iva dhamme aññā sati vā upādisese anāgāmi tā ti
eka udi bhūtaḥ vihane tamam saḥ
idhā iva sambodhim anuttaram phusa iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
